title: Understand the Rules
text: Each row, column, and 3x3 grid must contain the numbers 1, 2, and 3 exactly once, with no repetitions.

title: Start with the First Row
text: The first row is: 1 _ 3. What number is missing to complete 1, 2, 3?

title: Complete the Third Row
text: Think about the available numbers and the pattern.The third row is: 3 _ 2. Which number is missing to make it contain 1, 2, and 3?

title: Solve the Second Row with Logic
text: The second row has: _ 3 _. Use column clues to figure out the correct numbers that complete the row without repeating in columns.
